content: In the third quarter of 2022, we recorded â¬58.3 million in revenues, representing a growth of almost 12% compared to last yearâs period. In other words, we expect our revenues to increase by at least 10% compared to last year, and we expect to post a full year adjusted EBITDA this year between â¬20 million and â¬25 million.
